cinvestav.android.pki.cryptography.key
Class ECPrivateKey

java.lang.Object
  cinvestav.android.pki.cryptography.key.ECPrivateKey

public class ECPrivateKey
extends java.lang.Object

Wraps the information of a Elliptic Curve Private Key and contain some parse functions to interact with JCE and SpongyCastle EC privateKey representations

Since:
06/06/2012
Version:
1.0
Author:
Ing. Javier Silva PÃ©rez - [javier]

Throws:

decode

public static ECPrivateKey decode(byte[] keyBytes,
                                  java.lang.String password)
                           throws CryptoUtilsException
Decodes a byte array encoded using base64 to an ECPrivateKey object

Parameters:
keyBytes - Base64 encoded byte array representing the key
password - Password used for encoding the key
Returns:
A new ECPrivateKey that correspond to the encoded bytes
Throws:
CryptoUtilsException - if the byte array does not correspond to a Base64 ECPrivateKey encoded key
